mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rn, a.* from (select sc.*, mo.no as no, mo.email as email, mo.nick as nick from second sc,(select m_no as no, m_email as email, m_nick as nick, m_del_yn as del_yn from member where m_del_yn='n' union select o_no, o_email, o_oname, o_del_yn from organ where o_del_yn='n') mo where sc.sh_mno=mo.no) a) where rn between #{startRow} and #{endRow};
select * from second where sh_mno < 0 and sh_mno=#{sh_mno} order by sh_reg_date desc
select * from second where sh_mno > 0 and sh_mno=#{sh_mno} order by sh_reg_date desc
mapper.update: update second set sh_mno=#{sh_mno}, sh_title=#{sh_title}, sh_category=#{sh_category}, sh_explanation=#{sh_explanation}, sh_image=#{sh_image} where sh_no=#{sh_no}
mapper.select: select count(*) from second where sh_mno=#{sh_mno}
mapper.update: update second set sh_approve='y', sh_arrive='y' where sh_no=#{sh_no}
update second set sh_approve='n' where sh_no=#{sh_no}
update second set sh_arrive='y' where sh_no=#{sh_no}
